name: Custom Sticker Design Template
description:
Custom Round Sticker Design Template
......................................................................

Custom Sticker design service includes: custom sticker design for your shoppe, products, website, or personal use.

Sticker design will come in both round and rectangle shapes.

You choose what images, colors, and text you want used on your sticker design.

If you have a personal logo already, your logo can be incorporated into your sticker design.

This is also a fun way to promote a wedding, birthday party, product, business, or special event.

Your personal design will be tailored to your business or personal event etc.

Your finished design will come to you via your current email in PSD and PDF format at 300 dpi for print quality, per Vista Print standards.

I do not print the design, you will have to upload to Vista Print to print your designs there.
This service is for custom design only.

Please Note:

If you have a particular image you want used in your design it must be commercial use compliant and be in 300 dpi. Anything less then 300 dpi will not print correctly.

If you want a commercial use image used in your design, you will be responsible for that cost, as well as, my cost for designing your sticker.

If you have any questions about this design service you can send me an email to: sassymelondesigns@gmail.com

Thank you for shopping at Sassy Melon Designs.

name: Custom Blogger Blog Design
description:
Custom Blogger Blog Design
---------------------------
This services includes the following:
-2 to 5 column layout
-Custom Header
-Matching Backgrounds
-Matching Post Signature
-5 Matching SideBar Titles
-1 Matching 120x120 Ad
-1 Matching Post Divider
Installation of Theme
+cost of commercial use graphics
used in the design.
I will also install easy widgets
into your design if requested.
-----------------------------
Things I will need to know
about your design:
-Name of Blog
-Colors you want in your design.
-Graphic Theme (flowers, dogs, butterflies etc).
-Name you want for your signature.
-Name on Ad
-Post Title Names (about me, labels, etc).
-Your link to your blog.
-Username
-Password
and any other info I need to incorporate into your design.

If you have your own logo that can be incorporated into the design with ease :)
------------------------------
The finished template will be
installed onto your blog. I will need blogs link, your login username and password. This can be changed once I'm done installing theme.
------------------------
Custom design takes approximately
3 to 5 business days, it varies depending on my work load.

Here are some blogs I just finished for customers:

DJ's Dusty Attic:
http://www.djsdustyattic.blogspot.com

Hello Whimsy:
http://www.hellowhimsy.com

Hugs, Sassy Melon Designs

name: Custom Logo Design
description:
Custom Logo Design
..........................................................................

Your logo represents your products through vision.
So you should have a logo that represents your brand in
every way through the use of image, color, and text.

This design service includes a custom
logo for your business, website or booth.

I will send you a short questionnaire with design questions
about your vision for your logo.
Once you fill that out and get it back to me, I will start working on your design.

I allow unlimited revisions on your logo design to ensure you
are happy with your final product.

Your finished logo will be sent to you via your current email in various file formats including jpg, png, and ai formats.
Also, your main logo will come to you in 300 dpi for print.

The price does not include any commercial use images you want used in your design. You will be responsible for that cost, as well as, my cost.

Thank you for shopping at Sassy Melon Designs.

Also, some of the logos in the preview are premade logos I currently have for sale and be customized for your business.
If interested in any of them, please email me at sassymelondesigns@gmail.com

You can also find my designs on Bonanza at:
http://www.bonanza.com/LoisCollis

name: Custom Facebook Welcome Page Design
description:
{Custom Facebook Welcome Page Design}
----------------------------------
This services includes:
-Custom Landing Page Design & matching avatar.
.Your choice of colors
.Your choice of fonts
.Your choice of images
.Matching avatar to go with your fan page
.Clickable image links
-installation of the welcome page
------------------------------
This is a simple welcome page design.
You are responsible for the cost of this design, as well as, any costs associated with commercial use graphics used in your design.
I try my best to use free copyright images, but in some cases this is not possible depending on what you want used in your design.

If you want more then just the landing page, each page will cost extra.

You can let me know before you purchase.

You will need to set up a Facebook Fanpage.
I will have to have username and password to login to your account to install the template.

If you have any questions about this service, please feel free to email me at: sassymelondesigns@gmail.com

Here is my fanpage:

http://www.facebook.com/sassymelondesigns

To give you an idea of how I did mine.
--------------------------------
I will also need a questionnaire with:
-Your name
-Any information pertaining to your design
-Facebook and username and password for your Fan Page.
-Tabs you want on your fan page.
-Links you wanted associated with your welcome page (big cartel, artfire, bonanza, blog, etc)
You can pm or email this info to me.

----PREVIEWS---------------
Previews are fan pages I have designed.

Thank you for shopping at Sassy Melon Designs!

name: Custom Banner Set Design
description:
: Custom Banner Set Design::
..............................................................................

Custom banner design. With this service you choose:
-your colors
-your images (theme)
-your fonts & text

I will design your banner based on
your vision. 

Finished banner & avatar will be sent to you via your current email in png format at 72 dpi for web.


Cost is $12, but if you request a commercial use image you will be responsible for that cost as well.

I try to only use copyright free images or images I am allowed to.
In cases where I don't have a particular graphic you want, you will be responsible for paying the commercial use cost of that graphic or image if necessary.

If you have your own business logo and need it incorporated into
your design no problem!

I can do banners for: Big Cartel, Bonanza, Etsy, Ecrater, Website, Blog, or any selling venue.  Let me know at the time of purchase the sizes needed.

If you have any questions, you can email me at:
sassymelondesigns@gmail.com

Hugs, Sassy Melon Designs!
